.. _`design_system_components_filedropzone`:

FileDropzone
============

.. figure:: images/component_filedropzone.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

File Dropzone component that enables to drop files from the file system into it. By clicking on it, users are also able to select files from the file system via the system file browser.

API Documentation
-----------------

:ref:`cs-web-components-base-components.FileDropzone.__default__`
